basics.name: Hojin Jeong
basics.label: Full-Stack Web Developer · Computer Science Major · Stony Brook University
basics.summary: Full-stack and front-end development experience. Traffic/AI system development, deployment, and internal efficiency projects (Global Bridge). Client websites and in-house design solution components (Heyboss). Project lead, team communication, client coordination, and delivery of efficient planning, implementation, and production deployment.

work.name: Global Bridge
work.summary: Full-time. Incheon, South Korea. Full-stack developer for traffic/AI systems, deployment, and internal efficiency projects. Web design, development, debugging; API server development; server setup; server and DB maintenance; intern mentoring and onboarding.
highlights: Led the development of a FastAPI & DLR SUMO-based Digital Twin traffic simulation API server with 500mil+ daily data input.
Developed the frontend of a Google Drive-like web tool for managing files inside the company NAS, boosting productivity by 30-50%.
Solely developed an ROI labeling web tool for the company's AI model to use, cutting down labeling work time by 50-100%.
Developed a deployment pipeline to the company server that requires only a single click, cutting down testing time by 50-70%.

work.name: Heyboss
work.summary: Full-time (Part-time). New Jersey, United States. Front-end developer for client websites and in-house design solution components. Web component design, development, debugging; AWS website deployment; intern mentoring.
highlights: Assisted the team in developing, testing, and deploying 6 websites as per the design requests from the clients, along with aftercare.
Ran and debugged web page deployment using AWS S3.
Worked in an agile, communicative, and collaborative environment with daily stand-ups to receive design requirements, and conduct tests for 50+ total components.

work.name: Heyboss
work.summary: Internship. Remote. Front-end development intern contributing to in-house design solution components.
highlights: Developed 10+ web components based on given instructions for the company component library.

projects.name: Traffic/Signal Assignment API Server
projects.description: Incheon ITS Digital Twin project. API server for processing vehicle data for simulation. Project lead 80%.
highlights: DLR SUMO-based traffic assignment logic; reduced 5-hour batch from 10+ min/timeout to under 4 min
One-click build and deployment in air-gapped environment
Custom Mapper reduced road-ID mapping from 1–2 hours to 1–2 minutes when road data updated

projects.name: AI Model File Management System
projects.description: System and frontend to auto-classify and store AI model files on NAS by name and purpose. Frontend lead 70%.
highlights: Synology NAS API–based upload, classification, and duplicate-prevention web system
Storybook for component documentation and maintainability
One-click deployment via Docker and shell scripts

projects.name: Client Homepage Development & Deployment
projects.description: Heyboss. Custom features and design for 6 client websites; development, deployment, maintenance. Project support & frontend 40%.
highlights: Custom component development; Storybook-based test and review process
AWS S3 static deployment, GitHub integration for debugging
All 6 sites launched with positive feedback

projects.name: In-House Design Solution Components
projects.description: Heyboss. Reusable components and design consistency. 50+ components. Project support & frontend 40%.
highlights: React and Tailwind components for reuse and extension
Storybook for option experimentation and design review; reduced QA burden
Intern mentoring; improved team velocity

projects.name: Maple Economy
projects.description: Website for Maple Story users to view equipment auction prices and estimate set costs. Pair project.
highlights: Auction price history graphs
Nexon API equipment list
Set cost calculation by preferred stats

projects.name: KartRushPlus Info
projects.description: Blog-style site for Kart Rider: Rush Plus: events, tips, recommended YouTube videos. Solo project.
highlights: Tip posts
Recommended videos by creator or list
One-click in-game coupon redemption

projects.name: Monster Hunter Wilds SFX Mods
projects.description: RE Engine mods replacing SFX in Monster Hunter Rise/Wilds. Nexus Mods; 8,000+ unique downloads.
highlights: 6 mods: wirebug→Spider-Man web-shooter SFX, gunlance M1 Garand reload, quest clear BGM, etc.
Wwise, RingingBloom, REtool for audio/asset pipeline
Commission work and community feedback integration
